mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman from A. J. Hoback
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, July 1, 1861, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Mannassas Junction, Pr. Wm. Co., Va from A. J. Hoback at Little River, subject: organization of companies from Floyd County and his decision to serve in military or as a doctor in county. 1 original piece of 6 written pages, 1 original envelope, and 3 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
